类型: Size: 9 WideColor: W81v2 | Canvas White
评论详情: I’m a personal trainer and I encourage clients to wear sneakers with a wider toe box and zero drop heel, but the most popular brands are $$$$. If you aren’t sure if you’re going to like transitioning, it’s difficult to spend so much money. These are a great option. For $40, you get the full experience of a barefoot/minimalist shoe without the price tag. I have a few pairs because I like to have different colors and I actually wear them more often than the pair I paid $160 for. The only thing I wish is that the material that’s easier to clean wasn’t always out of stock in my size 😂

类型: Size: 6.5 WideColor: W81v2 | Canvas White

评论概述: Durable and great for super wide feet!
类型: Size: 8 WideColor: W81v2 | Canvas White
评论详情: I rarely write reviews but I love these shoes so much I felt like I had to. I like them so much that I'm considering buying a couple extra pairs just in case they get discontinued.  Fit: It's super hard for me to find shoes that fit. I am a size 8 with triple wide feet. However, my width is only in the toebox-- my feet and ankles are of normal thickness. Most super wide shoes don't fit me because they make parts of the shoes besides just the toe box wide, eg, the top part and ankle. However, these shoes fit amazingly! The only perfect fit out of the box I've ever had without getting custom shoes. The toe box is actually wide enough!!! (I ordered 8 Wide.)  Comfort: The shoes are very basic. Just canvas and rubber soles, no support. That's the point of zero drop shoes! I find them very comfortable, but if you want arch support and padding, this isn't the shoe for you.  Durability: They are surpisingly durable! First pair was still doing well after nearly a year, replaced it bc I got them too dirty to clean. I first ordered a pair in Nov 2023. I wore that pair most days a week for nearly a year, putting at least 500 miles on the shoes. Even after that, they were still in good condition. Super impressed by their durability given that it's a relatively cheap ($30-45) product on Amazon. I ultimately replaced them not because they were falling apart, but because I got them so dirty while walking in mud that I couldn't adequately clean them.  Style: I love that these shoes are plain white canvas without any obstrusive patterns or logos. The white version would be perfect if you wanted to paint or embroider a custom design on a pair of shoes. They look classy and go with any outfit. Because they're versatile and lightweight, they're great for traveling.

类型: Size: 6.5 WideColor: W81v2 | Canvas Red Beige
评论详情: They look great, feel so comfortable, feet don't get tired after a 10+ hour workday standing and walking. Highly recommend.

类型: Size: 6.5 WideColor: W81v2 | Canvas Black White
评论详情: These shoes are SO COMFORTABLE. I am neurodivergent and wearing shoes has always been a huge struggle for me. I HATE how regular shoes feel on my feet and don’t even get me started on socks. From the moment I put these on and began walking, I knew I had made a great purchase! I wore them to my first day of college classes on a new campus, so LOTS of lost wondering trying to find my classes. Hardly even noticed I was wearing shoes. Until I stopped on laminate flooring. Remember in gym class, all the shoes squeaking on the basketball court inside the gym? YEP! Oh my goodness it was so loud! Every. Single. Time I stopped walking the shoe would make that chirping squeaking sound. I’m not sure how to make it stop, so I’ve been trying to make sure when I stop my feet actually stop moving instead of sliding to make that sound. 🤣

评论概述: Great toe space, Too high on the ankles
类型: Size: 9 WideColor: W81v2 | Canvas Beige Gum
评论详情: First off, the shoes came a day late so that I didn’t have a full 24 hours to test them out before wearing them outside.  It’s true that the toe box is wider than most shoes and my toes finally don’t feel scrunched up.Unfortunately the part that touches the ankle (and heel) which is apparently called the collar is extremely high and uncomfortable.  Some shoes end up cutting my heel and ankle because they’re too high and I think these may do the same.  If you’ve ever had problems with your ankles and heels, these may not be for you.

评论详情: These shoes are great! I was referred to them and gave them a shot. Being wary with each new experience and happily pleased. They are very comfortable and thin. You can feel the heat of the ground through your shoes. So be ready if you're going for a walk on pavement that's been in the sun all day in this 90 degree weather. I also worried when we had a thunderstorm. But as the shoes looked wet, I didn't feel moisture on my feet. I highly recommend these.

类型: Size: 8 WideColor: W81v2 | Canvas White
评论详情: I have numerous foot issues and normally spend $150 or more on my shoes. Multiple surgeries on my right foot as well as a considered size difference in my feet. These shoes actually work for me! I’m able to lace the right foot tighter at the top to keep my heal from slipping. My biggest issue in fit is my wide forefoot from the surgeries. These accommodate that issue with no problem. I’ve only worn them around the house, and I’m really not sure how they would be for long walks. These are more a “vanity” shoe for me to wear with casual dresses on vacation. Wanted a nice white leather shoe for that, but didn’t want to spend $100+ more for occasional wear.

I did remove the insole for better ground feel but they are flexible, broke in easily and are great on long walks.  My stylish teenager even approved the style!  Since the upper is glued to the sole I doubt they will last as long as Mukishoes but they are fantastic for 1/3 of the price!
Not the best for my big arches but they are very very comfortable. my feet sweat a bit when i wear these but nothing really bad. they go well with my boho theme.

评论详情: I keep getting ads for another brand of these "barefoot" shoes on instagram, so came to amazon to check them out. I was underwhelmed with the width of their toebox, so I found this brand, and thought they would fit my super-wide feet better. I wasn't sure how I would like this kind of shoe, but I immediately felt the difference when I put them on. I spend the majority of my life either barefoot, or in flip flops because I generally hate wearing shoes and socks. But I have been wearing these EVERY DAY even if I am not leaving the house. They are so comfortable, and I swear they are helping out with the pain I've had in my heel from a pulled tendon. Great for walking, super breathable, and just too cute. I am definitely going to have to get some in more colors! I highly recommend these if you have wide feet, but I imagine they'd be a bit too wide for someone with super narrow feet.

评论详情: I have wide feet, and all the cute little white canvas sneakers were really uncomfortable. These fit, without pinching my toes. The soles are thin and flexible, but provide enough cushion to be comfortable. I feel a little bit duck footed in them, but no one else seemed to notice this!

The are the most comfortable close-toed shoes I’ve ever warn! My feet have had so much room to actually move and “breathe.” They’re lightweight, flexible, and versatile enough to go with literally all my outfits. And I’ve been able to keep them clean by wiping them down with a baby wipe!
